product_name: Womo Designs Chassis with NightRider Handlebar Mount
long_description: Designed to securely hold your NiteRider bike light while you ride, the Womo Designs Chassis with NideRider Handlebar Mount frees up handlebar space. The Womo Designs Chassis with NideRider Handlebar Mount is machined from aircraft grade aluminum to create high rigidity for extra stability. Accepts a total of 2 accessory kits so you can mount 2 gadgets in tandem; accessory kits sold separately. This item includes only the WomoDesigns Chassis with NiteRider Handlebar Mount; NiteRider bike lights are sold separately. Compatible with 31.8mm diameter handlebars; anodized and laser etched.
short_description: Designed to securely hold your NiteRider bike light while you ride, the Womo Designs Chassis with NideRider Handlebar Mount frees up handlebar space.
